Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogic.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object

Business Logic Layer class for managing Orders. Handles validation and delegates CRUD operations to the OrderDao.

      Retrieves an order by its ID.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the order with the specified ID

    • insertOrder

      public Orders insertOrder(Orders c, ArrayList<Product> p, Client client)

      Inserts a new Order after validating it and checking the client and product list.

      Parameters:
      c - the order to be inserted
      p - the list of products associated with the order
      client - the client placing the order
      Returns:
      the inserted order
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the client is null or product list is empty

      Updates an existing Order.

      Parameters:
      s - the order to be updated
      Returns:
      the updated order

    • deleteOrder

      public boolean deleteOrder(int id)

      Deletes an Order by its ID.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the order to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • populateTableFromList

      public void populateTableFromList(JTable table, List<Orders> orders)

      Populates a JTable with orders data from a list of Orders.

      Parameters:
      table - the JTable to populate
      orders - the list of orders to populate the table with
